title: Can you un-ban my account?
body:
I'd like to play the game again with my account, if I could have my chat restricted or banned instead that would be better overall because I **was** **toxic** and it would actually let the game be enjoyable for someone or anyone to play with me.
I know I was **warned** the first time and I managed to get really, really annoyed at teammates within a few months time down the line and ended up getting **permanently banned**, yes there's no excuse for my actions.
The only solution to this would have been to disable chat or muting who ever it was, yet that leads to a lack of communication to other players which ends up making me get reported from  'not following the teams communications'  after the game(s) anyway.
I'd endeavor to get this account back after the amount of time, money and friends made throughout my league enjoyment. 
Thank you.

replies.body:
You don't have to type in order to communicate with your team, and are able to rely fully on pings. Not typing won't get you reported and punished for not communicating with your team.

Accounts only get unbanned if the punishment was applied in error, which considering you have admitted to toxicity doesn't make your case look hopeful. You can always discuss this further with [Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), since we are unable to help you on the boards.
What he's saying is if you used the chat you can be punished but if you run it down mid, you'll be able to play league forever.
